about.para1: i am a senior at brown university studying computer science and music. i am interested in the intersections between art, function, and how people interpret usable items.
about.para2: i am new to user interface design, but have some background in graphic design. i am always looking for more projects to take on.
about.para3: if you are interested in working with me, please email jumpingrabbit513@gmail.com.

portfolio-items.title: Coca-Cola Self Serve 7000
portfolio-items.subtitle: User Assessment
portfolio-items.short-description: A thorough investigation of the popular Coca-Cola soft drink machine and its users, including user observation, the creation of user personas, and user storyboards.

portfolio-items.title: NYU
portfolio-items.subtitle: Responsive Redesign
portfolio-items.short-description: An analysis and redesign of New York University's website, including analysis of usability principles, wireframes, and hi-fi prototypes.

portfolio-items.title: Lancey
portfolio-items.subtitle: Iterative Design
portfolio-items.short-description: A collaborative blind design for a startup focused on online user testing/prototyping. Complete with multiple brainstorming sketches, a wireframe, a hi-fi mockup, and real user testing.

portfolio-items.title: LandDweller
portfolio-items.subtitle: Real-Estate Site
portfolio-items.short-description: A functional real-estate site for desert burrowing animals. Users may shop from a wide selection of burrow homes with various prices, bed counts, furnishings, and locations.
